rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C199645

self.title: CDISC SEND Genetic Toxicology In vivo Category Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the category for genetic toxicology In vivo tests.
name: Genetic Toxicology In vivo Category
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Genetic Toxicology In vivo Category Terminology

terms.definition: The detection of test substance-induced DNA strand breaks following in vivo exposure, using a high throughput chip format.
terms.preferredTerm: In Vivo Comet Assay, Chip Format

terms.definition: The detection of test substance-induced DNA strand breaks following in vivo exposure, using a conventional slide-based format.
terms.preferredTerm: In vivo Comet Assay, Slide Based Format
synonyms: Single Cell Gel Electrophoresis Assay, Slide-Based

terms.definition: The detection of test substance-induced micronuclei formation following in vivo exposure.
